variants.Description in input context: This variant results in the substitution of Isoleucine with Valine at position 251.
This variant results in the substitution of Arginine with Glutamine at position 258.

Material used.Description: Western blot analysis was performed on postmortem brain tissue samples from Parkinson's disease patients.

Readout description.Result Description: UCHL1 protein expression was significantly reduced (approximately 60%) in carriers of the NM_002525.4:c.753A>G variant.
UCHL1 protein expression was moderately reduced (approximately 30%) in carriers of the NM_002525.4:c.773G>A variant.

Biological replicates.Description: Each variant was analyzed in three separate brain tissue samples.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was processed and blotted in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Brain tissue from age-matched controls without UCHL1 mutations served as positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Brain tissue from age-matched controls without UCHL1 mutations served as negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: t-test was used to compare protein expression levels.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Protein expression level within the range observed in age-matched controls.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Protein expression level more than 2 standard deviations below the mean observed in age-matched controls.
